actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to prohibit certain health care facilities from withholding from patients of such facilities food, water, nourishment, and hydration, if such withholding would cause the death of patients.

summary.text: Prohibits health care facilities receiving Federal financial assistance from withholding from any patient food, water, nourishment, and hydration if such withholding would cause the death of the patient.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit certain health care facilities from withholding from patients of such facilities food, water, nourishment, and hydration, if such withholding would cause the death of patients.
